prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a full body character portrait. The character's face and appearance must match the reference headshot exactly.

Physical appearance: Mobile cluster of broad leaves attached to flexible stem structure, approximately four feet tall. 15-20 large leaves arranged around central stem, each leaf 12-18 inches long, oval-shaped with smooth edges. Leaves shimmer and shift color from deep green to silvery-green depending on light angle and emotional state. Movement achieved through stem flexibility and leaf positioning—graceful, rustling motion like wind through foliage. Leaves vibrate to produce speech, creating soft rustling voice with good articulation. No visible face or eyes, but leaves orient toward whoever they're addressing. Overall impression: elegant, energetic, plant-in-motion.

Outfit and pose: A complete mobile plant organism, approximately four feet tall from base to topmost leaves. 15-20 large oval leaves (12-18 inches long) arranged around a flexible central stem structure. Leaves shimmer between deep green and silvery-green, caught in graceful rustling movement. Root system visible at the base where it meets the purple forest floor, showing how the plant achieves mobility. The complete stem structure from roots to uppermost leaves visible. Some leaves oriented forward in communicative positioning. Surrounded by purple forest floor with ferns and moss. Graceful, elegant bearing like wind moving through foliage. Lavender twilight atmosphere showing the leaves' color-shifting quality.

Framing: Full body, standing in a relaxed natural pose, head turned slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Leafwhisper" as text at the bottom of the image.

references.prompt:
Style: Delicate watercolor with soft washes and fine linework.
Muted palette: dusty lavenders, soft violet, warm grays, pale coral accents.
Vignette compositions fading gently to white.
Diffused lighting, intimate and quiet.

Generate a character portrait headshot (shoulders up) against a plain neutral background.

Physical appearance: Mobile cluster of broad leaves attached to flexible stem structure, approximately four feet tall. 15-20 large leaves arranged around central stem, each leaf 12-18 inches long, oval-shaped with smooth edges. Leaves shimmer and shift color from deep green to silvery-green depending on light angle and emotional state. Movement achieved through stem flexibility and leaf positioning—graceful, rustling motion like wind through foliage. Leaves vibrate to produce speech, creating soft rustling voice with good articulation. No visible face or eyes, but leaves orient toward whoever they're addressing. Overall impression: elegant, energetic, plant-in-motion.

Clothing and expression: A complete mobile plant organism approximately four feet tall. 15-20 large oval leaves (12-18 inches long) arranged around a substantial flexible central stem structure. Leaves shimmer between deep green and silvery-green depending on light angle, with smooth edges and elegant curves. Some leaves oriented forward as if mid-speech, showing communicative positioning. Leaves caught in rustling movement. No face, no eyes, no mouth - this is a plant organism. The complete body structure is visible, showing this is a full plant, not cut foliage. Graceful, articulate quality. Purple twilight background softly blurred.

Framing: Head and shoulders, centered, looking slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Leafwhisper" as text at the bottom of the image.
